articles.author: Shane Wright
articles.title: China dispute threatens Australia's economic recovery: OECD - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The OECD has upgraded its forecasts for the Australian economy while warning a dispute with China could delay the nation's recovery.
articles.content:
Despite the better forecast, the Australian economy is still not tracking to return to its pre-pandemic level until 2022.
